What is Linear Regression?

Linear regression models a target variable y as a linear function of input x: y = mx + b + noise.

title: Logistic Regression
summary: Classification using a sigmoid activation to map predictions to probabilities.
content_html:
What is Logistic Regression?

Logistic regression outputs probabilities for class membership using the logistic (sigmoid) function.
